document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">Wait </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">till </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">Majesty </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Death </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">Invests </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">mean </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">brow! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Almost </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">powdered </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">Footman </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Might </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">dare </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">touch </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">now! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">Wait </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">till </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">Everlasting </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">Robes </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">This </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">Democrat </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0e464">dressed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Then </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff6c8e">prate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">about </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7078ff">"Preferment" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">"Station" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0e464">rest! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Around </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">quiet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">Courtier </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">Obsequious </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff6c8e">Angels </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">wait! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Full </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">royal </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">Retinue! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7078ff">Full </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">purple </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">state! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">Lord </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">might </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">dare </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">lift </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">Hat </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">such </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70e498">modest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">Clay </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Since </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">My </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">Lord </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">Lord </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">Lords" </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">Receives </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">unblushingly! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Wait till the majesty of death
